name: Driving School - 2018
description:
Master your driving and parking skills in new realistic car driving simulator - Driving School 2018. Now you can drive your favorite car and learn rules of the road! The huge open world map is designed in a creative way to test your extreme car driving skills and provide the best gameplay experience.
Get your driving license now!
Play with your friends in a free ride multiplayer mode!

Driving School Simulator Features:
• Open world map
• Many different cars
• Realistic driving mechanics
• Free ride mode
• Multiplayer mode
• Ride with traffic
• Smooth and realistic car handling
• Realistic damage system
• Ultimate car driving expirience
• Crash your car!
• Drift mode
